name: The Amnesray
description:
A game made for the Weekly Game Jam. Music by Itchioneko

The Story:
Your surrounded by every terrible Memory attacking you from the left, the right, the front, and the back, you realize your dreaming and dream up "The Amnesray" a ray that can erase memories "Bad and Good".

The Goal:
Don't let your memories haunt you. Survive as long as you can or just enjoy destroying as many bad memories as possible.

Modes:
At the moment theirs only two "Hope" and "Nope" if you look at the pictures you'll probably be able to tell which one is "Nope" and which one is "Hope".

Controls:
Move: W, A, S, D  Look: mouse   Shoot: left mouse button  Aim: right mouse button
Full controller compatibility: (Not Recommended)
Move: Left Joystick,  Look: Right Joystick,  Shoot: Right Trigger,  Aim: Left Trigger
